blogComment: I need music to function, I have it on no matter what I am doing in the day.
My dream job would be to just sit and listen to music all day and get paid for it!
Anyone else obsessed with the band MUSE?
NOTHING compares to music from the 80s!
I can't decide which genre I like the most. Help!
The most rewarding thing is finding out your partner is as obsessed with music as you!
In my opinion music is the best therapy. It can instantly change a person's mood.
I get paid to play music for people and I love seeing their reactions to my mixes!
Music can bring people with complete different backgrounds together.
I heard that once you learn to play the violin, you can play other instruments automatically.
